import React from 'react' import './style.css' class OneProject extends React.Component{ render(){ var classtoggle=this.props.project.done ? 'done': 'undone'; return (


this.props.markToDone(this.props.index)} className={classtoggle}>
Name:
{this.props.project.name}
Description:
{this.props.project.description}
) } } export default OneProject
